task.summary:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/lankton/android-flowlayout
# Conflicts: # .gitignore create flowlayout library module
add the relayoutToAlign method , and things look good~
fix bug : use addView without MarginLayoutParam may cause casting exception

MESSAGE.value:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/lankton/android-flowlayout
# Conflicts: # .gitignore create flowlayout library module
add the relayoutToAlign method , and things look good~
fix bug : use addView without MarginLayoutParam may cause casting exception

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: fix bug : use addView without MarginLayoutParam may cause casting exception
